title: HUDSON Men's Walker Kick Flare
description: Fit: Mid-rise, slim through hip and thigh, flared bootcut hem: Our Walker Kick Flare jean is designed with a mid-rise waist, slim fit through the hip and thigh, and a flared bootcut hem for a modern and stylish look
Wash: Light blue, vintage-inspired Bandana wash: The Bandana wash jean features a light blue color with a laser-printed bandana motif, giving it a vintage and edgy appearance
Material: 99% Cotton, 1% Elastane: Made from high-quality cotton with a touch of elastane for added comfort and stretch, ensuring a perfect fit and all-day comfort

Details: Destruction at the knee, hem grinding, five-pocket details: The Walker Kick Flare jean features destruction at the knee, hem grinding, and classic five-pocket details, adding a rugged and authentic touch to the design
Care Instructions: Machine Wash: Easy to care for, the Walker Kick Flare jean can be machine washed for convenience, ensuring a long-lasting and durable product
Our Walker Kick Flare is a mid rise, slim through the hip and thigh with a flared bootcut hem.
